abstract: Joseph D. Ament of law firm Much Shelist Denenberg Ament and Rubenstein in Chicago suggests that recent tax guidance for victims of Ponzi schemes leaves many questions unanswered. Mr. Ament is also a professor of taxation and accounting at Roosevelt University’s Walter E. Heller College of Business Administration.
